# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    result = ""
    current_width = 0
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        if current_width + length(word) + (i > 1) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            current_width = 0
        end
        result *= word
        current_width += length(word) + (i > 1)
    end
    return result
end

println(wrap_string("This is a long string that needs to be wrapped"))
```

This will output:

```
This is a
long string
that needs to
be wrapped
```
